programme.desc: After Letty is killed, Dom returns to America in search of her killer. Brian is an FBI agent who is on the same trail as Dom, which leads to a drug ring and Letty's killer. Infiltrating the driver ranks, Dom and Brian try to get to the bottom things.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Sean Boswell travels to Tokyo to live with his father in the hopes of avoiding a jail sentence. In an impoverished section of the city, he gets drawn into the world of drift racing.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Montecito's guest wins, but his wallet is stolen before he can indulge in his winnings.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Falling in love with a new employee, Nessa presses her new mystery man for more details.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.desc: When five million dollars of diamonds are stolen, Danny and Mike try to catch the thief.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ed's old CIA comrade visits the casino pitching a new security system for the hotel.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Sin City screeches to a halt as a massive power outage brings darkness to the strip.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz Lemon is living every comedy writer's dream as the head writer of a live TV variety program in New York City. However, her world is turned upside down when a brash, new network executive interferes with her show and the staff.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After Jack Donaghy pushes for creative changes, Liz Lemon must face her writers and keep the show from falling apart. Meanwhile, the writing staff and cast learn how to deal with Tracy Jordan's antics.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Confident he can fix both Liz Lemon's sketch show and sex life, overbearing boss Jack sets Liz up on a blind date with his friend Thomas. With Liz readying herself for her blind date, Jack infiltrates the writers' weekly poker game.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: While Kenneth quickly realizes that working for Tracy may be more than he bargained for, Liz struggles to keep Jack out of the writers' room and the scantily clad Cerie in her clothes.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After being pressured by Jack to plug GE products into her show, Liz integrates Jack himself into a sketch. While Jack hones his acting chops, Frank and Toofer trick Jenna into fearing for her job, and Liz wonders if Tracy is faking illiteracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After Liz confesses that she got back with her boyfriend, Jack fears that she is living a life of mediocrity and takes it upon himself to be her mentor. Back at the show, Liz needs to deal with a physically altered cast.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack Donaghy bumps Jenna's scheduled appearance on 'Late Night With Conan O'Brien' by booking new star Tracy Jordan. Liz has her hands full when Tracy's prescription medication triggers erratic behaviour just before his appearance.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Fed up with the boorish antics of her boyfriend, Dennis, Liz sends him packing and attempts to hit the New York singles scene under the guidance of Jenna. Meanwhile, Jack deals with his own relationship woes.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz is forced to re-evaluate her personal life after Cerie announces she's engaged to a wealthy man. Meanwhile, Jack must deal with his mother's desire to move in with him.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jenna and Liz have a falling out over Jenna's new indie film, 'The Rural Juror.' Meanwhile, Jack encourages a cash-strapped Tracy to use his star power to endorse a product.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz and Jenna decide to get serious about their dating lives. Meanwhile, Jack and Kenneth the Page switch office roles for 'Bottoms Up' day, with Jack donning the page jacket and Kenneth spending the day as a corporate big wig.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz wonders if she is actually on a date with Jack when she accompanies him to a birthday celebration for a foreign prince. Meanwhile, Jenna desperately tries to capture the prince's affection in an attempt to become a princess.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After the entire cast binges on questionable seafood from the craft services table, they hunker down to pull an all-nighter on Valentine's Day. While Pete forgets the holiday all together, romance may be blooming between Kenneth the Page and Cerie.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz is enraged after Lutz bad-mouths her, then tries to redeem herself to everyone by adopting a more relaxed leadership style. Meanwhile, Jack takes Tracy to a charity golf event, but his plans to use Tracy to get close to the chairman backfire.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz is caught in the middle when Jack sees an opportunity to cut costs starting with Josh, whose contract is up for negotiation. Meanwhile, Jenna gets into trouble when she is misquoted, and Kenneth joins Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack tries to unload his sub-par wine by making it the sponsor of the Source Awards, which is to be hosted by a fearful Tracy. Meanwhile, Liz goes to great lengths to convince her date that she isn't racist.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack holds an impromptu family reunion during a taping after learning that his father died. Meanwhile, Liz struggles to decide who she should fire, and then goes power-mad after firing Floyd's girlfriend.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack and Kenneth work together when Jack discovers that another NBC executive is after his job. Meanwhile, Pete and Liz adjust to life as roommates, and Tracy learns he's a descendant of Thomas Jefferson.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After introducing Floyd to Jack, Liz begins to resent Jack's constant intrusions and his obsession with Floyd. Meanwhile, Tracy tries to get financing for his film on Thomas Jefferson.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Fed up with New York City and frustrated with his career, Floyd contemplates a move to the Midwest and asks Liz if she would consider going with him. Meanwhile, Liz grows suspicious of Jack's new fiancée.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz deals with the difficulties of her long-distance relationship with Floyd and enlists Kenneth's help in locating a missing Tracy. Meanwhile, Jack's impending marriage to Phoebe brings his mother to town.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz's excitement to be back from summer hiatus is quickly squashed when Jack tells her that, despite what she may think, she is not over Floyd. Jerry Seinfeld makes a guest appearance as himself when Jack announces his plans for SeinfeldVision.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack and his nemesis, Devin, lay on the charm with GE president Don Geiss when they hear he may be retiring. Meanwhile, Liz tries to get her life in order after Jack and Jenna lay into her about getting it together. Jenna starts to enjoy her fame.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack hires a private investigator to prevent GE from finding any evidence against him.

programme.desc: As part of a GE-wide green initiative, Jack wants to create a green mascot for NBC.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: At a cocktail party, Jack hits it off with C.C., a Democratic congresswoman. A paranoid Liz suspects that her Middle Eastern neighbour might possibly be a terrorist.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: As part of his community service, Tracy takes on the duties of coaching an inner city little league team from Knuckle Beach.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack is reluctant when C.C. decides she is ready to go public with their relationship. Elsewhere, Liz is forced to contend with Tracy and Jenna's demands for special recognition.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: It's time again for the office's annual 'Ludachristmas' party. Unfortunately Tracy can't participate due to his newly court-mandated alcohol-monitoring bracelet. Then, Liz and Jack's families come to visit.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: While Jack tries to close a deal with German TV executives, Liz invests in real estate. Meanwhile, C.C. and Jack continue their love affair in different cities, and Tracy buys a cappuccino machine for the staff.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack's campaign to become chairman is at risk when a staffer refers to him as a 'class moron' in the 'New York Post.' In an effort to identify the disloyal employee, he forces Jonathan to turn up the heat in the writers' room until one of them breaks.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz's old boyfriend, Dennis Duffy, jumps in front of a subway car to save a stranger, he becomes New York's newest celebrity and Jack wants him booked on the show. Dennis agrees to do the show and quickly tries to win Liz back into his life.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack is named successor as the Chairman of GE, who in turn chooses the always-loyal Liz as his successor. Meanwhile, Tracy's son does not invite him to Bring Your Dad to School Day.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: On TGS's annual sandwich day, the Teamsters pass out delicious sandwiches from a mystery deli in Brooklyn. Tracy, Kenneth, Jenna and Frank try to learn the location of the secret deli after Liz's sandwich is stolen.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack assumes a new political role in Washington, D.C. When the job is not what he expected, Jack partners with another government employee to plot how to get fired.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz tries to keep the staff from ruining her chances for adoption when an evaluator drops by the job. Jack returns from D.C. with a plan of action to go head-to-head with Devin Banks.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz and Jenna's friend visits New York and falls hard for Jack. Tracy helps a distraught Kenneth turn a dream into a reality.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Jack and Liz are invited to a dinner party at Gavin Volure's mansion, Jack is let in on a secret business opportunity, and the eccentric host becomes enamoured with Liz. Meanwhile, Tracy fears his children may have sinister plans for him.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz is opposed to attending her high school reunion, but Jack manages to convince her otherwise. Meanwhile, Don Geiss wakes up from his coma and shocks Jack with his declaration about who will become GE's CEO.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz's parents ditch her to celebrate the holidays at a couples-only retreat, leaving her all alone. To fill the void, she participates in a charity program for underprivileged kids. Meanwhile, Jack's dreams for a vacation away from his mother are crushed.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: The New Year brings something new for everyone as Liz's desire for a baby reaches a bizarre new level, Jack has a new love interest and Jenna auditions for a new role.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz fights for the staff's right to flu shots while Jack looks for creative ways to spend time with Elisa who is working seven days a week.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack recruits Liz to accompany him on a corporate retreat. Meanwhile, Jenna ends up at the mercy of Frank when she decides she needs to implore method acting to prepare for her Janis Joplin role.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz discovers she has a handsome and newly single neighbour she'd like to meet after receiving his mail by mistake. Meanwhile, Jack is determined to do whatever it takes to win over Elisa's grandmother.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Not realizing it's going to be the ultimate lovers' holiday, Liz insists she and Drew have their first official date on Valentine's Day. Jack prepares himself for an unconventional Valentine's Day spent at church with his girlfriend Elisa.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack considers taking the next step with Elisa, but has to choose between his commitments to her and his demanding career. Meanwhile, Tracy's interview on 'Larry King Live' sends New York City into a panic.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz befriends a pregnant teenaged doughnut shop employee in an attempt to adopt her baby. Back on set, Jenna vies for more attention from the TGS staff as her birthday approaches. Meanwhile, Jack bonds with Frank over their daddy issues.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz can't scheme her way out of jury duty, the 'TGS' cast and crew are left unmanaged. With no one in charge, Tracy and Jenna begin to act irresponsibly, while Jack becomes absorbed in launching a lucrative new product.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz learns that Drew's good looks and charm have resulted in him receiving special treatment. Meanwhile, Tracy's contract is up for renegotiation, and Jack searches for a way to keep him at 'TGS.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack's 50th birthday inspires him to recreate happy moments from his past. Meanwhile, Liz's ex-boyfriend comes clean about an addiction, and Tracy fulfills a childhood dream.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Excitement about the 50th 'TGS' show is short-lived as the employees begin to worry about upcoming budget cuts. Jack is forced to hand out pink slips, while Kenneth has to step up and take on some extra responsibilities.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: While suspended from work, Liz is lost without 'TGS' and must find a way to occupy her free time. Meanwhile, the studio has second thoughts on releasing Jenna's Janis Joplin biopic.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack and Elisa think seriously about their engagement, and Jack seeks marriage advice from Tracy. Meanwhile, when a prank results in an injury back at 'TGS,' Jenna loses her cool over an attractive EMT.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Tracy and Liz stop receiving preferential treatment and experience the reality of what it means to be each other's equal. Meanwhile, Jack's mother comes to visit, and Jenna adopts a pet gibbon.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: With encouragement from Liz and Tracy, Jack begins the search for his real father. When Tracy introduces his newly discovered illegitimate son to his friends, Liz and Pete questions the son's intentions. Meanwhile, Jenna and Liz fight for the spotlight.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: As Jack begins to build a relationship with his biological father, Milton's health hangs in the balance. Meanwhile, Liz draws attention as a relationship expert and Tracy's high school invites him to speak at graduation.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz Lemon is a head writer on a demanding, live TV program in New York City. Her life is jolted when brash network executive Jack Donaghy interferes with her show, and bullies her into convincing a wild, unpredictable movie star to join the show's cast.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Devin returns to plot revenge against Jack, he must find a way to protect the company and his job's safety. Meanwhile, Tracy and Jenna both have reasons to be angry with Liz and are determined to make her life miserable.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz and Jack venture down south to Kenneth's hometown to discover new talent. Jenna tries to make friends with the writers to solidify her place at TGS before the new cast member is hired. Meanwhile, Tracy fears for his life after two celebrities die.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: It's audition day and everyone is out to get the actor of their choice hired. While Liz and Pete try to rig the audition process, Tracy and Jenna decide it's in their best interest to conduct their own search. Amidst the chaos, Jack has personal issues.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: A new actor starts work causing Tracy and Jenna to reassess how they treat others. Jack offers Liz her own talk show.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz's apartment building is converted to condos, she has to make a drastic change in her living arrangements. Meanwhile, Jack and Tracy re-evaluate their plans for parenthood and Kenneth is on a mission to make TGS greener.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When production begins on Liz's new talk show, Liz begins to understand what it's been like for Jenna. Tracy takes on a challenge to prove his commitment to his wife.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Kenneth tries to organize a Secret Santa, but the office puts up resistance. Jack reconnects with a high school crush through a social networking site. Liz tries to find a gift good enough for Jack, while Jenna is upset about sharing her Christmas solo.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: After a wild New Year's Eve party, Jack tries to take back the damage he caused by leaving a drunken voicemail message on an old lover's machine.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz and Danny further their relationship, Jack gets jealous and plans to break them apart. Jenna pursues a relationship with James Franco in an attempt to cover up an embarrassing secret.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz decides to take TGS on the road to cure the staff of winter blues, the anticipated trip doesn't go quite as planned. Jack chooses the destination and travels with the show for his own interests.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz takes Frank in as a roommate, the two of them agree to help each other with their bad habits. Jenna turns to Jack for some advice on dealing with her mother.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: To not feel alone, Liz schedules a root canal for Valentine's Day, but then realizes she did not think it through. Jenna is disappointed when her stalker loses interest.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack's dreams come crashing down when Avery informs him that a cable company may buy out NBC.

programme.desc: Liz questions her faith when she keeps running into Wesley; Tracy Jordan is distressed about his reputation after a former nanny writes a tell-all book.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz re-evaluates her feelings for her old flame, Floyd, when he comes back with big news.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz makes herself more available for dating by attending singles events with Jenna, while Jack must choose between his new flame and his childhood love.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: When Liz learns that she is being excluded from the TGS staff's weekly hangouts, she strives to prove she can be fun. Jack must choose between the janitors and the shift time they both want.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Wedding fever has hit TGS, leaving Liz to sort out Grizz's dilemma when both Tracy and Dot Com want to be his best man. Jack is forced to deal with the death of his mentor.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: The cast and crew of TGS invite their moms to the set to celebrate Mother's Day. Liz meets her mom's old flame, while Jack's mother interferes with his relationship with Avery.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack becomes even more entangled in his love triangle with Avery and Nancy, and turns to Liz for some advice.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz questions fate when she meets the man of her dreams, and Jack's love triangle comes to a head.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack is determined to help Liz keep a man for once, so he meddles in her relationship with Carol.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz is surprised when more men start noticing her, and Jenna explains it's because she appears more confident. Jack decides to cheat mortality in order to teach his son how to live.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack must appear before Congress to discuss the merger between NBC and KableTown. He hopes to charm the celebrity members, but they demand more diversity in the programming lineup.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz Lemon grows increasingly infuriated when no one seems to remember that it's her 40th birthday. Just before the taping, Tracy Jordan becomes convinced that nothing is funnier than a performer laughing and breaking character.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack is having a perfect day, so he tries to help Liz figure out her relationship with Carol.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Avery points out the peculiarities of Jack and Liz's relationship, convincing Jack to set some boundaries. With Jack being distant, Liz is forced to deal with her father on her own.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack tries to influence a Congressional election in favour of a particular candidate. Liz finds the perfect pair of jeans.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack feels that GE's microwave sales have improved too much without his help and tries to find a glitch in the system. Liz partakes in a crew lottery despite being warned not to.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack recommends that Liz see a therapist when she worries that Carol is getting bored with their relationship.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Company budget cuts affect all the staff at TGS, and Liz tries to use Jack's wedding mistake in her favour. Jenna and Danny find themselves sharing a dressing room, and Tracy receives some disturbing medical news.

programme.desc: Tracey has a reality TV crew follow him around, which Liz tries to use to her advantage.

programme.desc: Jack tries to impress the owner of KableTown and Liz helps Avery hide her pregnancy from her competitive co-worker.

programme.desc: Joel attempts to partner up with Britta when the class is asked to pair up, but his plan fails and he winds up with an unwelcome partner. Shirley and Annie look at Britta's latest social justice cause with her.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff signs up for a class taught by Professor Whitman assuming he can achieve an easy A. After attending, Jeff quickly learns he will have to put a great deal of effort into the class to simply achieve a pass.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff gossips about Britta's new boyfriend, but then learns gossip can be a difficult monster to escape when he attempts to befriend Britta. Troy and Abed are test subjects in Professor Duncan's psychology research team.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Someone cheated on a Spanish test and Señor Chang is determined to find out who it was. He threatens to fail the entire class if the cheater doesn't step forward. Jeff defends the person who comes forward, and Pierce writes a new school song.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff wants to save his career by convincing Troy to join the football team, but Annie throws off his plan. Shirley takes the time to teach Britta the etiquette of girl talk.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff is attracted to his statistics professor and is determined to take her out on a date, but it happens to interfere with a 'Day of the Dead' party Annie is throwing. Meanwhile, Pierce comes to terms with being old.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: When the gang finds out Jeff is living out of his car, they offer their help. Meanwhile, Annie helps Troy plan the perfect date for another girl and Pierce joins Vaughn's band. Eric Christian Olsen guest stars.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Professor Whitman and Dean Pelton convince Jeff to join the debate team after Annie's partner drops out right before the championship debate.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Señor Chang assigns an excessive amount of homework and Jeff is elected to be the one to speak with him about it. Jeff strikes up an unusual friendship with him and the gang gets upset about Jeff's added perks.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: After a challenge from Britta, Jeff must find a girl for a double date with Pierce and his new girlfriend. Meanwhile, Britta and Shirley help Annie get an anatomical education for a presentation she must give at a special health fair for the school.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Shirley learns about her classmates' various religious backgrounds when she tries to throw a Christmas party. Jeff is challenged by a bully and faces the chance of him failing Spanish 101.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: The gang reunites after winter break and, much to their surprise, there's a new addition. One of their fellow classmates is eager to join their study group, and the gang must decide whether or not the individual is worthy.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Jeff has a new girlfriend but he is determined to keep his affair a secret. Meanwhile, Troy and Britta have secrets of their own and decide to share it with their friends.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Annie starts hanging out with Britta's ex-boyfriend and Jeff vows to protect her. Pierce feels he is left out of Troy and Abed's movie night.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to fix his relationship with Britta after things get awkward because of a drunken phone call.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff is excited to show off his pool skills in his new billiards class only to have his will tested when he is required to wear shorts in order to play.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: It's family day at the college and all the families come to join in the fun. Jeff helps Pierce connect with his stepdaughter Amber.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff takes an unexpected interest in a pottery class after another student shows some natural talent. Pierce brings Britta, Shirley and Troy along for a ride at his boating class.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Pierce is willing to do and wear whatever it takes to reach a new level of ascension in his Buddhist church.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jeff and Troy take on the chicken finger shortage that has gripped Greendale Community College. After witnessing this show of activism, Britta struggles with the unsatisfactory number of causes she is currently supporting.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: After Pierce crosses a line with Shirley, the group must choose between the two. Jeff and Britta face off against a group of bullies and their mother, and Abed embarks on a college 'bucket' list.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: The sexual tension between Jeff and Britta becomes a hot topic amongst the study group. A simple contest for a chance at early class registration turns the campus into an all-out war zone.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: After the shocking discovery that Senor Chang does not have a teaching degree, Greendale is forced to bring in a new Spanish teacher.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Jealousy runs rampant at Greendale as Britta and Professor Slater fight for the affection of Jeff. Troy is confused when Abed doesn't invite him to move into the dorm with him.

programme.desc: Single mom Erin installs a security system when she realizes that someone's been inside her home. But that doesn't stop the intruder from breaking in, determined to end her life as well as his own.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: In desolate, isolated Nebraska in 2014, Valerie and her loving adopted son Nathan are starting a new chapter of their lives when a knock at the door one night brings back demons of the past.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: A burning car is found by the side of a highway on the same night a single mother of two is reported missing. These two events are connected, and connecting the dots will lead investigators to a notorious criminal who has been hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: In 1994, Lake Orion, Michigan is rocked by a vicious murder. At first, the crime is a mystery. But in a small town where everyone knows each other, rumors start flying. Soon, police expose a strange and twisted plot that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: After sneaking out of his parent's Garden Grove, CA house for a secret late-night party, 19-year-old Jose Najera returns home to find both parents dead on their bedroom floor. Is it a random killing or a robbery gone wrong? The truth is more diabolical.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, a beloved father of four is found dead in his car. He's been bound, gagged, and asphyxiated. Witnesses lead detectives to a local man named John Brian Ray. But this troubled man is just a pawn in the larger game of a criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Pennsylvania native Janet Lynn Mickey's greatest dream is to start her own family. So, when she marries college football-star Darrell Tyburski her future seems secure. But when the young couple has children, they are led down the darkest path.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: When Samuel Johnson Jr. suddenly vanishes, San Antonio investigators find themselves face-to-face with two sisters who know something. Through a series of interrogations, they reveal an elaborate murder plot meticulously engineered by a puppeteer.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Three men die over a span of a dozen years, with no suspicion of wrongdoing and no files charged. But when a deadly car explosion rips through downtown Pensacola, Florida, a new investigation begins. And all suspicion points toward just one person.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Corey Breininger was a child, his stepmother, Judith Hawkey, coerced him into doing something horrible. Tormented by guilt, he kept her deadly secret for years. Knowing what she was capable of, he wasn't sure he could tell the truth and live.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: On the mornings when Joylynn Martinez couldn't remember the night before, she always told herself that she must have had too much to drink. She never suspected that her own husband, Robert Howard Bruce, was responsible or that he was just getting started.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Wallace Jeffs was raised to believe that his half-brother, Warren, would guide his family to salvation.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Shirley Furgala helped her mother, Betty Lou Beets, drag a dead body to the yard and bury it, she knew her own life might be in danger if she refused to help. What Shirley didn't know was this wouldn't be the last time her mother would ask for help.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Not long after Terra Newell met her mother's new boyfriend, she sensed John Meehan was no good. Debra Newell never suspected her new man was secretly plotting to destroy her and her family. And Terra never imagined she would ultimately be forced to kill.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Elizabeth Flores was a child, her sister, Louise, tried to shield her from a horrible family secret. But when Louise met David Turpin, that all changed. The girl who ran from monsters became one herself.

programme.title: My Husband the Serial Killer: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving Day, Alvin 'Bud' Brown was arrested after a decade of evading police. To his wife, the man she shared a bed with for years had always appeared to be gentle and loving until she discovered that Bud had left her nothing to be thankful for.

programme.desc: Newlyweds Kristi and Jim Newman have their Christian beliefs tested to the limit when they come face to face with three masked men in their home. The intruders aren't just here to rob them, they're here to break their souls.

programme.desc: Catherine thinks that dumping her boyfriend will solve her problems, but when he breaks into her home intending to kill her, he takes her family hostage.
